description: Imyanda yose, yaba iy’impinja ndetse n’abana bato igomba gutabwa mu musarani.
title: Imyanda yose, yaba iy’impinja ndetse n’abana bato igomba gutabwa mu musarani.
content:
Imyanda yose, yaba iy’impinja ndetse n’abana bato igomba gutabwa mu
musarani. Buri rugo rugomba kugira umusarani usukuye. Ahatari umusarani 
imyanda itabwa kure y’urugo, kure y’inzira, kure y’imigezi cyangwa ahandi 
abana bakinira.
Imisarani igomba gusukurwa kenshi kandi igapfundikirwa, ikoresha amazi 
agasukwamo. Imisarani isukuye ntikunze gukurura isazi.
